summary: Diff does not provide evidence that REQ-1 (replace adjustRecoveryForTestMode) or REQ-2 (add five Debug.print lines in generateFullBodyWorkout) were implemented in backend/main.mo. Additionally, an extra file (project_state.json) was modified, which violates the constraint to keep changes confined to backend/main.mo.

missing_requirements.requirement: In backend/main.mo, replace the entire implementation of adjustRecoveryForTestMode(_caller : Principal) : RecoveryState with the exact provided code block (including fullyRecoveredTime = 0 - (100 * 3_600_000_000_000); and recoveryPercentage = 100.0 for chest/back/shoulders/arms/core/quadsRecovery/hamstringsRecovery/glutesRecovery/calvesRecovery).
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff excerpt of backend/main.mo is truncated and does not include adjustRecoveryForTestMode, so there is no evidence the function body was replaced as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: In backend/main.mo, inside generateFullBodyWorkout, add exactly five specified Debug.print(...) statements to log requested exercise counts for Chest, Quads, Hamstrings, Glutes, and Calves using getExerciseCountForGroup("<Group>", currentRecovery).toText().
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff excerpt of backend/main.mo is truncated and does not include generateFullBodyWorkout or any of the required Debug.print lines, so there is no evidence the logging was added.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json (project metadata/state) despite requirement/constraint to keep all changes confined to backend/main.mo and avoid schema/state changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains changes to backend/main.mo only; project_state.json was modified and includes new/altered summaries and feature request entries not part of the two specified backend changes.
